_documentation_.1: Do not modify this file. Instead, place a copy in ~/.tomato/ or /etc/tomato.
_documentation_.2: You can either remove the examples, or use them as non-examples.
_documentation_.3: 'templates' is a filter for template names. Only use those templates that are specified here (all techs)
_documentation_.4: 'template_source' is the backend where templates will be fetched from
_documentation_.5: 'site' is the site for all hosts
_documentation_.6: 'hosts' is a list of hosts to be used for testing.
